channel.title: Win 7 Account?
channel.description: So im currently on an administrator account that my parents have to log me into once i log off or start my computer (they know the password, I don't). How do I make an account, but not have an icon to click to log in it? for example there's my admin account: "anthony". Then instead of hitting "switch user" and clicking on dundermifflin; being able to have a login field saying "username" and "password" Ive done this before by accident on my other computer but couldn't find out how. And ive also googled and couldn't find. This way i can log on while they shut my computer off at night and when they go to sleep, i jsut turn it on and log into the account that they don't know is there. Thanks!

item.title: Win 7 Account?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Dunder Mifflin:

In limited cause I am out all day with friends and whatnot ad when I come home and use the computer I tend to stay up REALLY late even on school nights

That kon-boot program lets you login without using a password. Just sayin.

item.title: Win 7 Account?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You think they wouldn’t notice the change?

Personally I’d talk to them and try to figure out ways to get more privileges rather than be dishonest (hmmm… I wonder why they limit you…)

I was literally the same way as you, had to get them to log me in each time. But I stuck with it and here I am, with admin priv’s on all the computers we have

Read full topic

I think this is what you’re looking for.

The third reply includes adding “CTRL+ALT+DEL”.

item.title: Win 7 Account?

item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Remove the password if you are on an administration account? Or duel boot another operating system.

item.title: Win 7 Account?

item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

So im currently on an administrator account that my parents have to log me into once i log off or start my computer (they know the password, I don’t). How do I make an account, but not have an icon to click to log in it?
for example there’s my admin account: “anthony”. Then instead of hitting “switch user” and clicking on dundermifflin; being able to have a login field saying “username” and “password” Ive done this before by accident on my other computer but couldn’t find out how. And ive also googled and couldn’t find. This way i can log on while they shut my computer off at night and when they go to sleep, i jsut turn it on and log into the account that they don’t know is there. Thanks!
